Trade/Device Name(s): Instant-view-plus Immunochemical Fecal Occult Blood Test
Specimen Container(s): Specimen collection tube with extraction/detection buffer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Instant-view-plus Immunochemical Fecal Occult Blood Test, a chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection of fecal occult blood using Driven Flow Technology.
Indications for Use Summary: A qualitative immunoassay for detection of fecal occult blood, intended for professional and over the counter use.
